en: You haven't been getting as many job offers of late, so you have no work due today. Spend the time applying for jobs and sprucing up your website, or take the day to look after yourself?
You add your most recent work to your resume and get your name out there. The hope that some of it will pay off puts you in a good mood.
You really needed this day off. It's just not healthy to be working every hour of the day.
